detectors.description:
SafeMath.sub(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SMT.sol#31-34) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(b <= a) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SMT.sol#32)

BasicToken.canTransfer(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SMT.sol#126-132) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-locked (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SMT.sol#127)

StandardToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SMT.sol#183-260) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions
	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SMT.sol#91)
	- BasicToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SMT.sol#142-152)
	- ERC20Basic.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SMT.sol#92)
	- ERC20Basic.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SMT.sol#93)
	- BasicToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SMT.sol#159-161)
